Product: Voltas Beko DT8B Free Standing 8 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
Review_Summary: Initial review after using for 2 days. Very useful in covid times. Size is appropriate for small kitchen..Utensils comes out clean but we prefer to rinse utensils a bit else stickiness patches of milk etc may remain at some places..as of now using 1.30 hr cycle. Currently, very satisfied with voltas beko machine..the demo guy has good knowledge and brought salt, dishwasher detergent and rinse along with which is good (obviously need to pay extra for that) .. flipkart delivery is awesome

Once in a while it does not clean properly ..but majorly it works much cleaner . We can't put aluminum kadai and cookers as it changes the colour . But w...

Product: Voltas Beko DT8B Free Standing 8 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
Review_Summary: Overall good product, To get optimum results, the water hardness level should be set in the the dishwasher. Installation was simple plug and play, if you know a bit of plumbing, I did it myself. Voltas gave a free gift of dishwashing tablets from Vim for around RS1000/-. This is a useful product, given the current scenario, and can be used by a small family of 2-4 persons. Appropriate size to sit on the counter top...

Product: Voltas Beko DT8B Free Standing 8 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
Review_Summary: Have been using it for 2 weeks. Always preferred the big one but had to buy 8 place setting because of space constraint. If you have enough space in home then please go ahead with 12 place setting or higher. As for cleanliness, it cleans well and apart from burnt vessels, everything gets cleaned including milk vessel. Also, and lot of cleansing is dependent on the detergent or tablet you use. We tried with 4-5 brands and settled with finish detergent. So keep that in mind.

Product: Voltas Beko DT8B Free Standing 8 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
Review_Summary: Pros . perfect for small family.Fits  dmarts dishes easilyTakes 20-30 mins. Cleans utensils except burnt pots. Cons. Indian big steel plates dont fit in.Doesnt clean properly if not placed correctlyToo costly detergent approx 700 per month

Product: Voltas Beko DT8B Free Standing 8 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
Review_Summary: The product is awesome. Tho there's cost cutting. I didn't get tap connector and all. But still it's great.  1:30 Hour cycle is the best cycle. It can easily handle the load of 4-5 people if you know space management inside the dishwasher. You can wash 4-5 plates, 3-4 utensils, 6-7 glasses, 3-4 Kolis easily. Aluminum utensils will not be suitable in any dishwasher so beware of that, If you have too much aluminum  dishes. I was little unhappy by the installation guy because he didn't come seco...

Product: Voltas Beko DT8B Free Standing 8 Place Settings Intensive Kadhai Cleaning| No Pre-rinse Required Dishwasher
